thread.title: Xergos Avenger
thread.title_full: Instant Gaming évalué par Xergos Avenger

author: Xergos Avenger
title: Xergos Avenger
text:
There was a small issue with the PayPal authentification process. I did not received my call and cannot complete my purchase. I wrote a ticket and after a short period of time the guys at instantgaming solved my issue. This was great.
Only one thing needs to be improved. There is no shoping cart on this website to keep an individual collection of different games for later purchase? Why?
